attributes.additional_details:
We the under signed here give notice that:
 If the BBC doesn't stop it's biased reporting on Palestine break their  silent about the atrocities being committed on the Palestinian civilians by the Israeli govt. Showing clear bias when only reporting when Israel is being counter-attacked.
This will leave us no options but to refuse to pay the TV license under section 15 of the Terrorism Act (2000) if they do not report accurately .
There were nearly 10,000 people who attended the protest recently in Central London but there was was no mention of this on the News or on their website.
